name: RunAWay (Cable)
description:
In the near future set on the now colonized planet of Mars, an engineer working on a remote beacon finds himself in a dangerous situation and must survive by managing his limited resources and doing what it takes to defend against a new hostile threat!

Built on the Phaser game engine, RunAWay is a retro inspired vertical survival shooter created for Gamedev.js Game Jam 2022.

Inspired by the theme RAW, we included minerals and meat into our game along with the themes of Mars and Exploration in line with the MPL challenge.
